forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Thunder possible. High 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Thunder possible. High 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late. Low -6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow likely late. Low 23F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 39F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. A foot or more of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low near -5C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 26F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to partly cloudy conditions during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to partly cloudy conditions during the afternoon. High 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow will become heavy at times overnight. Low near -5C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 30cm or more of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will become heavy at times overnight. Low 26F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. A foot or more of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Snow will be heavy at times especially during the morning. High 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Snow will be heavy at times especially during the morning. High 38F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of a foot or more.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low around -5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 20-30cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low near 25F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. High 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers during the evening. Then partly to mostly cloudy overnight. Low -11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers during the evening. Then partly to mostly cloudy overnight. Low 14F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low -9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 17F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 22F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 27F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 33F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
